title: HLA variants and their association with IgE-Mediated banana allergy: A cross-sectional study
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Irin Vichara-anont, Lalita Lumkul, Settawut Taratikhundej, Manop Pithukpakorn, Ekkapong Roothumnong, Chamard Wongsa, Thanachit Krikeerati, Aree Jameekornrak Taweechue, Orathai Theankeaw, Nathachit Limjunyawong, Nitat Sookrung, Torpong Thongngarm, Mongkhon Sompornrattanaphan
